required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Long Term Follow-up Study of AMG0001 in Subjects With Critical Limb Ischemia
clinical_study.official_title: A Long Term Follow-up Study of AMG0001 in Subjects With Critical Limb Ischemia

brief_summary.textblock: Subjects from the AG-CLI-0206 phase 3 study that received AMG0001 will be eligible for the AG-CLI-0206-LTFU study

detailed_description.textblock: The study is designed to assess the long term safety of subjects who have been treated in the phase 3 study with AMG0001. A health questionnaire will be used to collect specific information from the subject every 6 months. Only those subjects that were randomized in the AG-CLI-0206 study and who received AMG0001 are eligible to participate in this long term follow-up study. Subjects that received placebo will not be eligible for participation in this study.

primary_outcome.measure: Assess the long term safety of subjects from the AG-CLI-0206 study who have been treated with AMG0001
primary_outcome.time_frame: 3 years from the date last subject randomized into AG-CLI-0206 study
primary_outcome.description: A health questionnaire will be used to collect specific information from the subject every 6 months

arm_group.description: Subjects from Study AG-CLI-0206 who received the study product AMG0001

intervention.intervention_name: Subjects from Study AG-CLI-0206 who received AMG0001
intervention.description: Subjects from Study AG-CLI-0206 who received the study product AMG0001

study_pop.textblock: Subjects with critical limb ischemia who have previously been treated with AMG0001 in the AM-CLI-0206 study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who have been treated with AMG0001 in the AG-CLI-0206 study.
- Subjects who have provided consent for this long term follow-up study either directly or through a legally authorized representative.
- Subjects who have provided a release of information to the sponsor.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who were not enrolled in the AGCLI-0206 study.
- Subjects who enrolled in AG-CLI-0206 and who were not treated with AMG0001.
- Subjects who have not provided consent to this long term follow-up study either directly or through a legally authorized representative.
- Subjects who have not provided a release of information for the Sponsor to contact them directly via phone, email and/or mail.
